Submodules

models.facade module

class models.facade.Facade(user_name: str)

Bases: object

Facade class representing the interface for interacting with game entities and data.

Variables:

  • protagonist (Protagonist) – The main character in the game.

  • enemy (Enemy) – The enemy character in the game.

  • command_dao (CommandDAO) – Data access object for retrieving game commands and information.

location_id()

Get the current location ID of the protagonist.

direction()

Get the available directions for the current location.

name_location()

Get the name of the current location.

description_location()

Get the description of the current location.

story_line(line_id)

Get the story line data for the specified line ID.

change_health(line_id)

Change the health, experience, and enemy health based on the specified line ID.

check_move_next_location()

Check if the protagonist can move to the next location.

change_healith(line_id)

Change the health, experience, and enemy health based on the specified line ID.

Args

line_id (int): The ID of the story line.

check_move_next_location()

Check if the protagonist can move to the next location.

Returns:

True if the protagonist can move to the next location,

otherwise False.

Return type:

bool

property description_location

Get the description of the current location.

property direction

Get the available directions for the current location.

property location_id

Get the current location ID of the protagonist.

property name_location

Get the name of the current location.

story_line(line_id)

Get the story line data for the specified line ID and update game state accordingly.

Args

line_id (int): The ID of the story line.

Returns:

The story line data if available, otherwise None.

Return type:

dict or None
